duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform intermediate level troubleshooting and preventive maintenance tasks on tractors, trailers, chassis, containers, and power equipment.
Conduct tire replacements/flat repairs, brake adjustments/services/replacements, and electrical diagnostics.
Patch holes in trailer/container side panels and roofs, ensuring they are sealed and watertight.
Operate service truck in a professional manner, keep it clean and well stocked, and follow all safety requirements while at a customer or rail yard.
